subpanels.description: View from right side of Deltoceras beluga sp. nov., FMNH-P30321, holotype, from bed PO 07, from the Olenidsletta Member, Floian, Ordovician, Profilstranda section, Ny Friesland, Spitsbergen. Scale bar = 10 mm.

Ventral view of Deltoceras beluga sp. nov., FMNH-P30321, holotype, from bed PO 07, from the Olenidsletta Member, Floian, Ordovician, Profilstranda section, Ny Friesland, Spitsbergen. Note the deep u-shaped hyponomic sinus. Scale bar = 10 mm.

View from left side of Deltoceras beluga sp. nov., FMNH-P30321, holotype, from bed PO 07, from the Olenidsletta Member, Floian, Ordovician, Profilstranda section, Ny Friesland, Spitsbergen. Scale bar = 10 mm.
